name: Super Dash Cube
description:
WSAD to Move 

Space to Jump

Right Click to Dash

Press R to reset

Wanna simulate die? Press T to yeet yourself and then restart 

Dodge the missiles to literally live, but you die if they hit you tho.

Supports ps4 controller because I don't have any other ones lol

Left stick to move

Right stick to look around

x to jump

square to Dash

For Mix and Jam 2020 First Jam ayyyy --
